answers.answer: Hello and hope you are doing well.The symptom described by you could be due to neuropathy. It is a disorder of the nerves which causes numbness, tingling, unusual sensations and sometimes pain. Diabetes Mellitus can cause neuropathy. Other causes like vitamin deficiencies, alcohol consumption and certain medications can cause neuropathy. If your symptoms are troublesome, consult your doctor.Hope this helped and do keep us posted.

question: When does my right leg pulse every few seconds
